name: Chicken Chimichangas
ingredients: 1-­‐8 oz pkg cream cheese, room temperature
steps: Boil chicken until no longer pink in the middle, chill and shred. To the shredded chicken, add the cream
cheese, green chilies, garlic and seasonings. This is the chimichanga filling; add about ¼ c of filling with
cheddar cheese in the center of a warm flour tortilla. fold in thirds and then fold in ends and seal with a
toothpick. Make sure oil is hot enough before you fry the chimichangas. To save on time and oil, fry in a
shallow pan with a ½ inch of oil, just enough to make a nice golden shell.
These freeze really good. Put in freezer before frying.
